name: LTERsitesAnalysis_Datasets
description: This dataset contains tarballs of the research, data collection, data analysis, and reports from the LTERsitesAnalysis research package that attempts to utilize DataONE holdings of LTER's different sites to determine if they improved the completeness of their collections with respect to the LTER Recommendation for Completeness over the time period 1/1/2005 - 31/12/2018
